Package chess.model.moves

Class RegularMove

java.lang.Object
chess.model.Colored
chess.model.moves.Movable
chess.model.moves.Movement
chess.model.moves.RegularMove
All Implemented Interfaces:
chess.persistence.Codable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Capture, Castling, TwoSquareAdvance
public class RegularMove extends Movement
A concrete subtype of Movement that represents a regular move.

A regular move is a simple movement defined solely by a piece's position change where the final position is an empty position (no piece).

A regular move serves as a base movement for all other movement variants, including Castling, which consists of two basic regular moves.

A regular move can be applied to all concrete subclasses of Piece.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularMove

      public RegularMove(Piece piece, Position finalPosition)
      Constructs a regular move for a subject piece and a final position.
      Parameters:
      piece - The target piece of the regular move.
      finalPosition - The final position of the regular move.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If any of the arguments is null.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public int execute(Chessboard chessboard)
      Executes this regular move on the given chessboard and increments the move count of the target piece.

      As a result, the target piece is moved to the final position of this regular move.

      Overrides:
      execute in class Movement
      Parameters:
      chessboard - The chessboard on which this regular move is executed.
      Returns:
      0 points, since a regular move is associated with no points.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If chessboard is null.

    • undo

      public int undo(Chessboard chessboard)
      Undoes this regular move on the given chessboard and decrements the move count of the target piece.

      As a result, the target piece is moved back to the initial position of this regular move.

      Overrides:
      undo in class Movement
      Parameters:
      chessboard - The chessboard on which this regular move is undone.
      Returns:
      0 points, since a regular move is associated with no points.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If chessboard is null.
